title: Clement confirms Rangers injury blow as Tavernier ruled out of Old Firm
description: Rangers captain James Tavernier has been ruled out of Thursday’s Old Firm derby with an injury that will keep him on the sidelines for “a few weeks”. Tavernier will miss the visit of Scottish Premiership leaders Celtic after scan results showed “clear damage” picked up during Rangers’ 2-2 draw with Motherwell. title: Ferdinand: Rangnick was right about Man Utd open-heart surgery
description: Rio Ferdinand conceded that former Manchester United interim boss Ralf Rangnick was right about the club needing open-heart surgery as the Red Devils’ struggles continue. United were beaten 2-0 by Newcastle United on Monday, meaning they will end 2024 in 14th place, their lowest position at the turn of the year in the league since […] The post Ferdinand: Rangnick was right about Man Utd open-heart surgery appeared first on Soccer News.
